info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:55PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Valley County through 315 PM MDT... At 254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hospital Bar, or 40 miles northwest of Challis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bernard Creek Guard Station around 310 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Idaho.
